casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 25, 2014

[Cite as 04/25/2014 Case Announcements #2, 2014-Ohio-1768.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2014-0626. State v. Lawson.

Mahoning App. No. 12 MA 194, 2014-Ohio-879. This cause is pending before the court as a *1475jurisdictional appeal.

Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay, it is ordered by the court that appellee shall file a response, if any, to the motion for stay no later than Thursday, May 1, 2014.
